Title: Fever Pitch
Overview: Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.
Tagline: A Comedy About The Game of Love.
production_companies: Fox 2000 Pictures, Wildgaze Films, Alan Greenspan Productions, Mars Media Beteiligungs, Flower Films (II), ELC Productions Ltd.
Cast: Drew Barrymore, Jimmy Fallon, Jason Spevack
